name: Table Tennis World Tour
description: When playing like a champion in this challenging ping pong game prepare with realistic physics.  Choose from 20 countries and 60 opponents from around the world in the selection.  Controls and touch which are very easy to learn to play.  You simply move the table tennis bat and hit the ball in the direction you want it on the board.  Practice power spins and shots to catch your opponents off guard and fail in parry, be careful they might do the same in attack on you.  If you can collect all the trophies and win the World Tour in this ping pong game, let's prove your skills.
